alert.note: Alert for Carlton (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 16 at 2:31PM CST until December 16 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 330 PM CST. * At 229 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, or 13 miles southwest of Cloquet, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility of one quarter of a mile or less in heavy snow. This includes Interstate 35 from Moose Lake to Mahtowa. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous travel. Locations impacted include... Mahtowa, Barnum, Cromwell, Kettle River, Nemadji, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Moose Lake State Park, Kettle Lake, and Sawyer. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Do not use cruise control in winter driving conditions.
